definitions.definition: to become white or whiter ; to bleach or blanch .
examples: The trees in spring whiten with blossoms.

definitions.definition: To increase the security of an iterated block cipher by steps that combine the data with portions of the key .
To normalize data so that the covariance matrix becomes the identity matrix ; i.e., to remove correlations so each variable has unit variance.

main_definition: ( ergative ) (To cause) to become white or whiter ; to bleach or blanch .
secondary_definitions: ( cryptography ) To increase the security of an iterated block cipher by steps that combine the data with portions of the key .
( statistics ) To normalize data so that the covariance matrix becomes the identity matrix ; i.e., to remove correlations so each variable has unit variance.
